extendedInfo.description: Baby Nursing / Breastfeeding (Timer & Activities log) is a simple and intuitive app to help you keep track of your baby's nursing progress and more! â­ Our easy-to-use timer lets you track your nursing records real-time. Simply press "Start" and "Stop"! And if you have started a timer and leave the app, you will receive a notification to remind you to stop the timer! â­ View detailed and useful info of your nursing progress - such as the most recent nursing, daily averages and accumulative totals! We even help you calculate how much in ounces you have fed your baby! Enter how much your baby weighs either before or after feeding or enter an estimate of "ounces per minute" and we will do the calculations for you! â­ Track your baby's growth progress! Record your baby's height, weight and head-size and we plot all those data onto a growth chart for you! â­ Use our Diary feature to record and review the daily happenings, milestones and special moments of your baby! â­ That's not it! By purchasing our in-app purchase features, you can track even more things for your baby!! â­â­â­ In App Purchases â­â­â­ â Premium â Our Premium in-app upgrade unlocks EVERYTHING BELOW!! At a discounted price!! â¥ Bottle â¥ Bottle upgrade allows you to track bottle feedings for your baby! Formula, breast milk, juices or anything you want to track! â¥ Diaper â¥ Diaper upgrade allows you to track diaper usage for your baby! Whether itâs dry, wet, BM or both Wet and BM! â¥ Pumping â¥ Pumping upgrade is for moms who'd like to keep track of their breast milk pumping progress! Like Nursing, you can use our simple timer to track your pumping progress in real-time! â¥ Sleeping â¥ Sleeping upgrade keeps track of sleeping times of your baby! Again, use our simple timer to track sleeping in real-time! â¥ Solids â¥ Solids upgrade keeps track of your baby's eating routine! Select from our comprehensive food list! There is also an intelligent "Recent" meal list that lists out recent keywords to speed up the selection process! Stay on top on your baby's progress and have fun!

reviews.title: Fix crashes for better rating
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app to help track my nursing for my newborn. Even bought the premium app so I could record diapers, pumping, and supplementing. I report it every time it crashes, and that happens multiple times per day. Otherwise, the function of the app is nice. Don\'t see the necessity to record the \"notes\" applied from the previous diaper change to the current one. Also, when starting a nursing session,  I select R or L and after completion, I have to reselect that option. Fix for better rating.
reviews.author: Mary MacGillis

reviews.title: Force closes, doesn\'t remember side
reviews.comment: Force closes almost every time. Even if you hit R or L at beginning you have to re-choose side when saving again or it will default to last saved size. Annoying. Menu option to start a session not intuitive.
reviews.author: Sonia Sethi

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: It helps me keep trak of my baby\'s feeding and stuff
reviews.author: Lamees Saud

reviews.title: Fix the crashing and I\'d rate it a 5
reviews.comment: App is great for keeping track of your nursing times and frequencies. I would have given the app a 5 start rating but it crashes every time I open it which is extremely frustrating.
reviews.author: lindsey martinez

reviews.title: Would be great if it didn\'t crash
reviews.comment: This app is really easy to use but it crashes EVERY time I open it, so I always have to reopen it. I even paid $4.99 for the premium version and that\'s when it started to crash. I still use it but it\'s been frustrating. If they could get it to stop crashing I would give it 5 stars
reviews.author: Antonia Lawson

reviews.title: Freezes too much
reviews.comment: This application is great.... when it works. Helpful in keeping track of not only feedng but sleep, bottle and pumping. HOWEVER,  it is always freezing or crashing. I\'d give it 5 stars if they fix that
reviews.author: Pam Pruitt

reviews.title: Keeps crashing!
reviews.comment: I like it when it works but now it won\'t open at all
reviews.author: Nicole Sell

reviews.title: Love but freezes
reviews.comment: I love the app but very upset that I paid for it and it freezes and once I get more then 2 days of records it takes almost a minite to pull anything up! Can this please be fixed! Samsung Galaxy S4 user
reviews.author: Jessica Miller

reviews.title: New to Motherhood
reviews.comment: Makes it easy when your still recovering from pregnancy-brain to keep track of all those important baby details!!!
reviews.author: Christie Olson

reviews.title: Still debating
reviews.comment: Havent used it cause baby is due next month... But I thought the entire thing was free but its $2.00 for the premium.. Ill keep looking around and maybe come back to this.
reviews.author: Jason Igo

reviews.comment: Keeps unexpected ending the app. Also when I record something it says I can\'t because something else is at that time to.....no other category had that time slot.
reviews.author: Mandy Groves

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is a great app, but I do not understand why iPhone has a newer version of this app than Android?
reviews.author: Donna Chew

reviews.comment: Constantly stops working not easy when ur tryin to feed a bab
reviews.author: Brittany Kjos

reviews.title: Is ok
reviews.comment: Is an ok app,  it crashes sometimes when I try to open it. I have to try several times before it will open. At times it also will not save the times that I edit or enter manually.
reviews.author: Renee Thorn

reviews.title: Beware
reviews.comment: In app purchases for crucial things. What would you use this for without diaper or bottle tracking? Uninstalling.
reviews.author: David Needham

reviews.title: Not worth price
reviews.comment: Would think they would makr cheeper for moms
reviews.author: Nichole Shearer
